body_html:
Thanks. I looked at that thread. The problem there was the name of script matched package name i.e. tensorflow. I am simply using a shell from anaconda python 3.6. The shell, as you can see is launched from a directory different than tensorflow source tree.
Think there might be in issue with pip_package.

body:
Thanks. I looked at that thread. The problem there was the name of script matched package name i.e. *tensorflow*. I am simply using a shell from anaconda python 3.6. The shell, as you can see is launched from a directory different than tensorflow source tree.
Think there might be in issue with pip_package.
